title: CANT LOG IN
body: i cant log in the OLD client. when i try to it says something is wrong with my internet. but the new client works fine. point here is that i want to go on the OLD client.....

replies.body:
The Legacy Client relies on some older Internet Explorer settings in order to authenticate you and let you past our login servers. I recommend working through our [**Login Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) to address those settings, since it may resolve this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
